body: Obviously there has been a player decline, and personally I don't think there's as much attracting players to donating as there once one, so I am assuming here that there has been a decline in donations as well. So, with less people donating from a reduced amount of people, how has avicus managed to keep itself going? It confuzzles me

title: How profitable is Avicus?
